Urgot: The Dreadnought

Release Date: August 24, 2010

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique and intimidating appearance, Urgot has become a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into Urgot's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his place in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Urgot

Urgot's tale is one of tragedy and transformation. Once a renowned Noxian headsman, Urgot's life took a dark turn when he was betrayed and captured by his enemies. He was subjected to horrific experiments by the infamous Zaunite chem-barons, who sought to create the perfect killing machine.

These experiments left Urgot's body mutilated and fused with machinery, turning him into a hulking monstrosity. Now, he is a grotesque fusion of flesh and metal, driven by a burning desire for revenge against those who wronged him.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Urgot possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a formidable champion in the game. His primary strength lies in his ability to dish out sustained damage while being incredibly tanky. With his passive ability, Echoing Flames, Urgot can continuously fire his shotgun knees at enemies, dealing significant damage over time.

Furthermore, Urgot's Q ability, Corrosive Charge, allows him to poke and harass opponents from a safe distance. This ability not only damages enemies but also reduces their armor, making them more vulnerable to Urgot's attacks. Additionally, his W ability, Purge, grants him a shield and increases his attack speed, further enhancing his damage output.

Urgot's ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, is a game-changer. He launches chains at an enemy champion, suppressing them and dealing massive damage. If the target's health is low enough, Urgot can execute them, instantly eliminating them from the fight. This ability can turn the tide of battles and secure crucial kills for Urgot and his team.

However, Urgot does have his weaknesses. His lack of mobility makes him susceptible to crowd control effects and ganks from the enemy jungler. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, leaving him vulnerable during the downtime. Skilled opponents who can dodge Urgot's skillshots can also mitigate his damage output.

Urgot in the Game

In the game, Urgot is primarily played in the top lane as a bruiser or tank. His tankiness and sustained damage make him a formidable laner, capable of bullying opponents and denying them farm. Urgot's ability to reduce armor also makes him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can shred through tanks and squishy targets alike.

Urgot's unique playstyle and appearance have made him a fan-favorite among League of Legends players. His grotesque design and tragic backstory add depth to his character, making him an intriguing champion to explore. Players who enjoy a mix of tankiness, sustained damage, and strategic decision-making will find Urgot to be a rewarding champion to master.

On our website, you can access information and videos of all the skins available for Urgot. From the classic Battlecast Urgot to the fearsome High Noon Urgot, there are various options to customize your champion's appearance and make him truly your own.

So, whether you're looking to dominate the top lane or simply want to experience the thrill of playing as a monstrous fusion of flesh and machine, Urgot is the champion for you. Embrace the dreadnought's power and unleash devastation upon your enemies!

Urgot (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a fearsome champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his menacing appearance and deadly arsenal, Urgot strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Urgot's default skin and explore all the intricate details of this iconic costume.

The Story of Urgot's Default Skin

Urgot's default skin represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the League of Legends universe. Clad in heavy armor and wielding a massive chainsaw-like weapon, Urgot embodies the essence of a relentless war machine. His metallic body is adorned with various mechanical components, showcasing his transformation from a once-human Noxian soldier into a hulking monstrosity.

The default skin features Urgot's signature color scheme, with a predominantly dark and menacing palette. His armor is a combination of dull gray and black, giving him a formidable and intimidating presence on the battlefield. The intricate details of his armor, such as the rivets and plating, highlight the craftsmanship that went into creating this fearsome appearance.

Urgot's chainsaw-like weapon, known as the Echoing Flamespitter, is a central element of his default skin. The weapon is a testament to his brutal and relentless nature, capable of tearing through his enemies with ease. The flamespitter emits a fiery glow, adding an extra layer of menace to Urgot's already terrifying presence.

Overall, Urgot's default skin perfectly captures the essence of his character. It showcases his transformation into a monstrous war machine, ready to unleash devastation upon his foes. The attention to detail and the menacing color scheme make this skin a standout choice for players who want to embody the true essence of Urgot.

The Story of Urgot

Urgot's journey in the League of Legends universe is a tragic one. Once a proud Noxian soldier, Urgot was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. He was captured by the enemy and subjected to horrific experiments, transforming him into the monstrous being he is today.

Now, Urgot seeks revenge against those who wronged him, using his newfound strength and resilience to wreak havoc on the battlefield. He is a relentless force, capable of enduring immense amounts of damage while dishing out devastating attacks. Urgot's unique abilities, such as his Corrosive Charge and Fear Beyond Death, make him a formidable opponent in both close-quarters combat and long-range engagements.

Despite his terrifying appearance, Urgot possesses a tragic backstory that adds depth to his character. He serves as a reminder of the consequences of betrayal and the lengths one can go to seek vengeance. Urgot's story resonates with players who appreciate complex and multifaceted champions, making him a popular choice among the League of Legends community.

Urgot's Place in the Game

Urgot is primarily played as a top laner in the game, utilizing his tankiness and damage output to dominate his opponents. His unique playstyle revolves around landing skillshots and positioning himself strategically to maximize his damage potential. Urgot's ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, allows him to execute low-health enemies, making him a formidable threat in team fights.

While Urgot excels in certain aspects of the game, he also has his weaknesses. His lack of mobility makes him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, Urgot's reliance on landing skillshots means that he can struggle against champions with high mobility or the ability to dodge his attacks.

Despite these weaknesses, Urgot remains a popular pick among experienced players who appreciate his unique playstyle and devastating damage output. His ability to dominate the top lane and impact team fights makes him a valuable asset to any team composition.

Explore Urgot's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Urgot's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the different ways you can customize Urgot's appearance and unleash his full potential on the battlefield.

Urgot (Giant Enemy Crabgot)

RP Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: June 26, 2012

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his unique and intimidating appearance, Urgot has become a fan-favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is
which transforms Urgot into a fearsome crab-like creature. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Urgot's

skin and explore all the intricate details of this captivating costume.

The Story of Giant Enemy Crabgot

The
skin for Urgot was released on June 26, 2012, and quickly gained popularity among players. This skin takes inspiration from the infamous

meme that originated from a parody video of a historical Japanese game demonstration. The video humorously exaggerated the game's boss battles, including a giant crab enemy. Riot Games, the developer of League of Legends, embraced this meme and created the

skin as a playful nod to the community.

With this skin, Urgot undergoes a complete transformation, turning into a massive crab-like creature. His mechanical body is replaced with a crustacean exoskeleton, complete with sharp pincers and a menacing appearance. The skin features vibrant colors, with shades of blue and purple dominating Urgot's new look. The attention to detail is remarkable, as even Urgot's abilities and animations are altered to match his new crustacean form.

Urgot's Q ability, Acid Hunter, now fires crab-like projectiles, while his W ability, Purge, unleashes a flurry of claw strikes. His E ability, Disdain, sees Urgot charging forward with his massive pincers, ready to crush his enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, transforms Urgot's target into a helpless crab before executing them with a swift strike.

Overall, the

skin is a delightful addition to Urgot's collection, offering players a unique and entertaining way to experience the champion. Whether you're a fan of the meme or simply enjoy the novelty of playing as a giant crab, this skin is sure to bring a smile to your face.

The Story of Urgot

Urgot, once a fearsome Noxian executioner, was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. However, he was saved by the mad chemist Singed, who transformed him into a hulking monstrosity. Now, Urgot seeks revenge against those who wronged him, using his new mechanical body to instill fear in his enemies.

Urgot's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to lock down and eliminate high-priority targets. With his long-range poke and crowd control abilities, Urgot excels at harassing opponents and setting up kills for his team. His passive ability, Echoing Flames, allows him to deal bonus damage with his basic attacks, while his Q ability, Corrosive Charge, fires a projectile that damages and slows enemies.

Urgot's W ability, Purge, is a toggle ability that enhances his basic attacks, causing them to deal increased damage and apply on-hit effects. This ability also grants Urgot a shield, providing him with some much-needed survivability in team fights. His E ability, Disdain, is a powerful crowd control ability that allows Urgot to dash forward, knocking up and stunning enemies in his path.

Finally, Urgot's ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, is a devastating execution ability that can turn the tide of a battle. When activated, Urgot suppresses an enemy champion, dragging them towards him. If the target's health is low enough, Urgot can then execute them, dealing massive damage and securing the kill.

Urgot's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and eliminate high-value targets. His long-range poke and crowd control make him a formidable opponent in both solo and team fights. Additionally, his tankiness and sustain allow him to survive in the midst of combat, making him a durable frontliner for his team.

However, Urgot does have his weaknesses. He lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing Urgot. Finally, his ultimate ability requires careful execution, as mistiming it can result in a wasted opportunity or even a lost fight.

In the world of League of Legends, Urgot has carved out a unique place for himself. With his intimidating appearance and powerful abilities, he has become a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of his lore or simply enjoy playing as a monstrous executioner, Urgot offers a thrilling and satisfying experience for players.

For more information about Urgot and his various appearances, including the

skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website or watch videos showcasing his gameplay on platforms like YouTube and Twitch. Embrace the power of the Dreadnought and dominate your enemies as Urgot!

Urgot (Butcher Urgot)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2017

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his terrifying appearance and deadly abilities, Urgot has become a favorite among players who enjoy dominating the battlefield. One of Urgot's most iconic skins is

which transforms him into a menacing butcher ready to carve up his enemies.

Released on August 1, 2017, Butcher Urgot quickly gained popularity among players for its unique design and thematic elements. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Urgot, giving him a new look that strikes fear into the hearts of his opponents.

Butcher Urgot: A Gruesome Transformation

Butcher Urgot takes the already fearsome appearance of Urgot and amplifies it to terrifying levels. This skin features Urgot as a hulking butcher, clad in blood-stained aprons and wielding a massive meat cleaver. His mechanical legs are replaced with gruesome, bone-like appendages, adding to his menacing presence on the battlefield.

The attention to detail in Butcher Urgot is truly remarkable. From the blood splatters on his apron to the intricate design of his meat cleaver, every aspect of this skin has been carefully crafted to create a chilling and immersive experience for players. The animations and visual effects have also been modified to match the theme, ensuring that every ability and attack feels satisfyingly brutal.

One of the standout features of Butcher Urgot is his recall animation. When Urgot recalls, he pulls out a slab of meat and starts carving it with his cleaver, showcasing his butchering skills. This small touch adds an extra layer of personality to the skin and further enhances the overall theme.

The Story of Urgot

Urgot, once a fearsome Noxian executioner, was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. However, he was saved by the mad scientist Singed, who transformed him into a monstrous abomination. Now, Urgot seeks revenge against those who wronged him, using his mechanical limbs and deadly arsenal to wreak havoc on the battlefield.

In the game, Urgot is classified as a Juggernaut, a champion known for his durability and sustained damage output. His kit revolves around his unique ability, Echoing Flames, which allows him to deal damage over time to enemies in a cone-shaped area. Urgot's ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, is a powerful execution tool that can instantly eliminate low-health targets.

Urgot's strengths lie in his ability to sustain damage and lock down enemies. With his passive ability, Echoing Flames, he can continuously harass opponents and whittle down their health. His W ability, Purge, grants him a shield and increased attack speed, making him a formidable duelist. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, can turn the tide of team fights by instantly eliminating a priority target.

However, Urgot also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, Urgot's abilities have relatively long cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing him.

Despite his weaknesses, Urgot has found a place in the game as a strong top lane pick. His ability to bully opponents and sustain through trades makes him a formidable laner. In team fights, Urgot excels at diving into the enemy backline and disrupting their carries, thanks to his tankiness and crowd control abilities.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Urgot's appearances, including the terrifying Butcher Urgot skin. Whether you're a fan of Urgot's lore or looking to master his playstyle, this page is your go-to resource for all things Urgot.

Urgot (Fright Night Urgot)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 20, 2021

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for his terrifying appearance and deadly abilities, Urgot has become a favorite among players who enjoy dominating the battlefield. With the release of the

skin, players can now experience a whole new level of fear as they unleash their power with this haunting costume.

The

skin is a part of the Halloween-themed skins released by Riot Games, the creators of League of Legends. This skin transforms Urgot into a nightmarish creature, complete with glowing red eyes, tattered clothing, and a menacing presence. The skin features unique visual effects and animations that perfectly capture the essence of terror, making it a must-have for any Urgot enthusiast.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the transformation of Urgot's abilities. Each ability now showcases a spooky twist, adding an extra layer of fear to his already formidable arsenal. From his Q ability, Echoing Flames, which now emits ghostly flames, to his W ability, Purge, which leaves behind a trail of eerie mist, every ability has been carefully crafted to enhance the skin's theme.

Furthermore, the

skin also includes unique recall animations and sound effects. When Urgot recalls, he is enveloped in a cloud of darkness before reappearing with a bone-chilling laugh. These small details add to the overall immersive experience of playing with the skin, making it a delight for both Urgot players and their opponents.

Now, let's delve into the story of Urgot and his place in the League of Legends universe. Urgot was once a fearsome Noxian executioner, known for his brutal methods and unwavering loyalty to the empire. However, his loyalty proved to be his downfall when he was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. Urgot's body was salvaged and transformed into a monstrous abomination by the mad scientist, Singed.

Now a half-human, half-machine monstrosity, Urgot seeks revenge against those who wronged him. He has become a symbol of fear and terror, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies on the battlefield. With his powerful abilities, including his Corrosive Charge, Disdain, and Fear Beyond Death, Urgot excels at locking down and eliminating his opponents.

Urgot's strengths lie in his ability to sustain damage and control the battlefield. His passive ability, Echoing Flames, allows him to deal consistent damage to enemies in range, while his W ability, Purge, grants him a shield and increased damage reduction. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, can execute low-health enemies, making him a formidable force in team fights.

However, Urgot also has his weaknesses. He is relatively immobile, making him vulnerable to crowd control and kiting. His abilities also require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. Players must be strategic in their approach when playing Urgot, as a mistimed ability or poor positioning can quickly turn the tide of battle against him.

In the world of League of Legends, Urgot has found his place as a fearsome top lane champion. His unique playstyle and terrifying appearance make him a popular choice among players who enjoy dominating their opponents with sheer force. With the

skin, players can now take their Urgot gameplay to a whole new level, immersing themselves in the chilling atmosphere of the Halloween season.

For more information about Urgot and his various appearances, including the
skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the champion. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to enhance your League of Legends experience.

Urgot (Battlecast Urgot)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 22, 2012

Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his menacing appearance and unique playstyle, Urgot has become a favorite among players who enjoy a more unconventional approach to the game. One of Urgot's most iconic skins is

which transforms him into a fearsome machine of destruction.

Battlecast Urgot is a legendary skin that was released on August 22, 2012, and can be purchased for 1350 RP. This skin takes Urgot's already intimidating presence to a whole new level, turning him into a hulking mechanical monstrosity. With its intricate details and menacing design, Battlecast Urgot is a must-have for any Urgot enthusiast.

The skin features a complete overhaul of Urgot's appearance, replacing his organic limbs with mechanical ones and covering his body in heavy armor plating. His signature chainsaw-like legs are replaced with powerful hydraulic pistons, and his torso is adorned with various mechanical components. The skin also includes new visual effects for his abilities, giving them a more mechanical and futuristic feel.

One of the standout features of Battlecast Urgot is his ultimate ability,

When activated, Urgot launches a massive harpoon at his target, pulling them towards him. With the Battlecast skin, this ability is enhanced with additional visual effects, making it even more satisfying to land on unsuspecting enemies.

Urgot, the champion behind the Battlecast skin, has an interesting backstory within the League of Legends universe. Once a Noxian headsman, Urgot was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. However, he was saved by the mad scientist Viktor, who transformed him into a half-machine abomination. Now, Urgot seeks revenge on those who wronged him, using his new mechanical body to wreak havoc on the battlefield.

In terms of gameplay, Urgot is a unique champion who excels in the top lane. His kit revolves around his ability to lock down enemies and deal sustained damage over time. With his passive ability, Echoing Flames, Urgot can continuously harass his opponents with his auto-attacks. His Q ability, Corrosive Charge, allows him to poke from a distance and reduce the enemy's armor, making them more vulnerable to his attacks.

Urgot's W ability, Purge, is where his true power lies. When activated, Urgot's auto-attacks become ranged and deal bonus damage. Additionally, he can lock onto an enemy champion, slowing them and rapidly firing a barrage of missiles. This ability is perfect for dueling and shredding through tanks and bruisers.

His E ability, Disdain, is a powerful crowd control tool that allows Urgot to dash forward, knocking up and stunning any enemies in his path. This ability is great for engaging or disengaging from fights, as well as setting up ganks for his team.

Finally, Urgot's ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, is a game-changer. When activated, Urgot suppresses an enemy champion, pulling them towards him and dealing massive damage. If the target's health is low enough, Urgot can execute them, instantly killing them and resetting the cooldown of the ability. This ultimate is perfect for picking off high-priority targets or turning the tide of team fights.

Urgot's unique playstyle and powerful abilities make him a force to be reckoned with in the top lane. While he may not be the most popular champion, those who master Urgot can dominate their opponents and carry their team to victory.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Urgot's various appearances, including the fearsome Battlecast Urgot skin. Whether you're a fan of his mechanical monstrosity or prefer his classic look, there's something for everyone to enjoy when playing as Urgot.

Urgot (Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 1, 2022

League of Legends never fails to surprise its players with unique and creative skins, and the Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot skin is no exception. This whimsical and unexpected costume transforms the fearsome Noxian executioner into a cuddly and adorable character, ready to take on the Rift in his cozy pajamas.

Urgot, known for his intimidating appearance and deadly abilities, has been reimagined in this skin as a playful and lighthearted champion. The Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot skin brings a touch of humor and charm to the battlefield, allowing players to experience a different side of this fearsome character.

Let's delve into the details of this delightful skin. Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot features Urgot dressed in a pair of oversized, striped pajamas adorned with stars and moons. His mechanical legs have been transformed into fluffy slippers, complete with cute little bunny ears. The skin also includes a matching nightcap, adding an extra touch of coziness to Urgot's appearance.

One of the most notable changes in this skin is Urgot's weapon. Instead of his usual chainsaw-like arm, Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot wields a giant plush hammer. This comical weapon perfectly complements the overall theme of the skin, adding a playful element to Urgot's attacks.

Furthermore, Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot features unique visual and sound effects. His abilities have been modified to fit the whimsical nature of the skin. For example, his Q ability, Corrosive Charge, now launches a fluffy pillow at his enemies, leaving a trail of feathers in its wake. His W ability, Purge, emits a cloud of dreamy stars and sparkles, creating a magical atmosphere. These delightful changes enhance the overall experience of playing with Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot.

Now, let's take a moment to explore Urgot's story and his place in the League of Legends universe. Urgot, once a fearsome Noxian headsman, was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. However, he was saved and transformed into a monstrous cyborg by the mad chemist, Singed. Now, Urgot seeks revenge against those who wronged him, using his mechanical prowess and deadly abilities to execute his enemies.

In the game, Urgot is a unique champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His passive ability, Echoing Flames, allows him to deal bonus damage with his basic attacks. His Q ability, Corrosive Charge, launches a projectile that damages and slows enemies. Urgot's W ability, Purge, is a toggle ability that enhances his basic attacks and reduces incoming damage. His E ability, Disdain, pulls enemies towards him and stuns them, setting up for devastating combos. Finally, his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, executes low-health enemies, suppressing them and dealing massive damage.

Urgot's strengths lie in his ability to sustain damage and lock down enemies. With his tanky nature and crowd control abilities, he can disrupt team fights and isolate priority targets. However, he lacks mobility and can be vulnerable to kiting and ranged champions. Proper positioning and timing are crucial when playing Urgot to maximize his effectiveness.

If you're interested in exploring Urgot's other appearances and skins, you can find more information and videos on this page. From his classic Noxian High Command skin to the Battlecast and Star Guardian variants, Urgot offers a diverse range of visual experiences for players to enjoy.

So, whether you're looking to unleash chaos on the Rift as the fearsome Noxian executioner or embrace the whimsical charm of Pajama Guardian Cosplay Urgot, Urgot's skins provide a unique and enjoyable experience for League of Legends players.

Urgot (High Noon Urgot)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2019

Urgot, the Dreadnought, has always been a champion known for his menacing appearance and brutal playstyle. With the release of the High Noon Urgot skin, players can now experience a whole new level of terror as they take to the Rift with this dark and twisted version of the champion. This skin, priced at 1350 RP, was introduced to the League of Legends community on August 1, 2019, and has since become a fan-favorite among Urgot enthusiasts.

High Noon Urgot is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of the High Noon thematic, which is known for its wild west-inspired designs and eerie atmosphere. Urgot, in this skin, takes on the appearance of a twisted gunslinger, complete with a tattered duster, a wide-brimmed hat, and a pair of menacing revolvers for hands. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, with every aspect of Urgot's design reflecting the dark and gritty nature of the High Noon universe.

One of the standout features of High Noon Urgot is his unique animations and visual effects. From his menacing walk to his devastating abilities, every movement is carefully crafted to showcase the power and brutality of this skin. The revolvers on Urgot's hands come to life as he fires his abilities, unleashing a barrage of bullets and explosions that strike fear into the hearts of his enemies. The sound effects accompanying these abilities further enhance the immersive experience, making players feel like they are truly in the midst of a wild west showdown.

Furthermore, High Noon Urgot also features new voice lines that add depth to the character and further immerse players in the High Noon universe. Urgot's voice takes on a sinister tone, filled with malice and a thirst for vengeance. These voice lines perfectly complement the skin's theme, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Urgot and his place in the League of Legends universe. Urgot, once a fearsome Noxian executioner, was betrayed and left for dead by his own comrades. However, he was resurrected by the mad scientist, Singed, who transformed him into a monstrous abomination. Urgot's new form, a fusion of flesh and machinery, granted him immense strength and durability, but also condemned him to a life of pain and suffering.

In the game, Urgot is a unique champion who excels in the top lane. His kit revolves around his ability to lock down enemies, shred their defenses, and execute them with his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death. Urgot's passive, Echoing Flames, allows him to deal damage over time with his basic attacks, while his Q ability, Corrosive Charge, fires a projectile that damages and slows enemies. His W ability, Purge, allows him to unleash a barrage of shotgun blasts, shredding through enemy armor. Urgot's E ability, Disdain, is a powerful crowd control ability that pulls enemies towards him and stuns them. Finally, his ultimate ability, Fear Beyond Death, allows him to suppress and execute low-health enemies, dealing massive damage.

Urgot's strengths lie in his ability to dominate the laning phase with his high damage output and crowd control. His tankiness and sustain make him difficult to kill, while his ability to lock down enemies allows him to secure kills and control team fights. However, Urgot does have weaknesses. He lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to ganks and kiting. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing Urgot.

Urgot's story and gameplay have made him a popular pick among players who enjoy a unique and challenging playstyle. Whether you're a fan of his lore or simply enjoy dominating the top lane, Urgot is a champion that offers a rewarding experience for those who master him.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Urgot's appearances, including the High Noon Urgot skin. Explore the depths of his lore, learn his abilities, and witness the terror of High Noon Urgot in action. Embrace the darkness and unleash your inner gunslinger with this twisted and fearsome skin.
